Home.NoExposureDetectedDetailed: Based on your anonymous, random codes, you have not been near someone in the past 14 days who has tested positive for COVID-19.
Home.ExposureDetected: You have been exposed to COVID-19
Home.ExposureDetectedDetailed: Based on your anonymous, random codes, you have been near someone in the past 14 days who tested positive for COVID-19.
Home.SignalDataShared: Thank you for helping to slow the spread

SignalDataSharedDetailed.One: You will receive a notification asking you to share your anonymous, random codes each day for the next {number} days.
SignalDataSharedDetailed.Other: You will receive a notification asking you to share your anonymous, random codes each day for the next {number} days.

Home.DailyShare: Share your new anonymous, random codes
Home.DailyShareDetailed: Sharing your codes helps other app users know if they have been exposed to COVID-19.
Home.EnableBluetoothCTA: Bluetooth is needed for CovidAlert to work. It’s used to collect and share users’ anonymous, random codes.
Home.ExposureNotificationsDisabledDetailed: Exposure notifications are needed for CovidAlert to work.
Home.NoConnectivityDetailed: CovidAlert needs internet access to continue checking for potential exposure.

OverlayOpen.BluetoothCardBody: Bluetooth is needed for COVID Alert to work. It’s used to collect and share users’ anonymous, random codes.
OverlayOpen.EnterCodeCardTitle: If you test positive for COVID-19 and want to anonymously notify other app users:
OverlayOpen.EnterCodeCardBody1: 2. Go to your test results page
OverlayOpen.NotificationCardBody: You will not receive push notifications if you have possibly been exposed to COVID-19. Timely notification is important in helping to slow the spread.
OverlayOpen.ExposureNotificationCardBody: Exposure notifications are needed for CovidAlert to work.

Sharing.Title: Share app
Sharing.SubTitle: Every person using COVID Alert helps to slow the spread of COVID-19. Sharing this app will not share any personal data.
Sharing.Message: Join me in helping to slow the spread of COVID-19. Download the CovidAlert app: https://covid-19.ontario/covidalert

Onboarding.Body2: Get notified if you have been exposed to COVID-19, and notify others if you test positive.

OnboardingHowItWorks.Title: How it works
OnboardingHowItWorks.Body: Using Bluetooth, Covid Alert shares anonymous, randomly generated codes, with other app users nearby.
OnboardingHowItWorks.Body2: If you have been exposed to COVID-19 by another app user in the past 14 days, you will receive an anonymous notification.
OnboardingHowItWorks.Body3: If you test positive for COVID-19, you can anonymously notify others who have been near you, in the past 14 days.

OnboardingLocation.Title: Your location is not tracked
OnboardingLocation.Body3: where you are or have been

OnboardingPrivacy.Title: Your data and identity are private
OnboardingPrivacy.Body4: your medical information, unless you choose to share it anonymously, if you test positive
OnboardingPrivacy.Body5: The codes are generated randomly and never shared without your permission
OnboardingPrivacy.Body6: Use of the app is voluntary. You can delete it at any time.

ThankYou.Title: Thank you for helping
ThankYou.Body: Exposure notifications are on. You will receive a notification if CovidAlert detects that you have been exposed to COVID-19.

DataUpload.FormIntro: Please enter your 8-digit CovidAlert number to verify that you’ve received a positive test result.
DataUpload.InfoSmall: We will not share your information unless you give permission in the next step.
DataUpload.ConsentBody: Do we have your permission today, to share your anonymous, randomly generated codes with other app users who have been near you in the past 14 days? None of your personal information will be shared.
DataUpload.ConsentBody2: You will be asked once per day to share your codes. You must grant permission each time. Sharing is voluntary.
DataUpload.ErrorBody: Your CovidAlert code could not be recognized. Please try again.

Notification.ExposedMessageTitle: You have been exposed to COVID-19
Notification.ExposedMessageBody: Based on your anonymous, random codes, you have been near someone in the past 14 days who tested positive for COVID-19.
Notification.OffMessageBody: Turn on CovidAlert to get notified if you have potentially been exposed to COVID-19.
Notification.DailyUploadNotificationTitle: Would you like to share your random codes today?
Notification.DailyUploadNotificationBody: Sharing your codes helps other app users know if they have been exposed to COVID-19.

BottomSheet.OnStatus: CovidAlert is on, Tap for more information
BottomSheet.OffStatus: CovidAlert is off, Tap for more information

RegionPicker.Title: Select your province or territory
RegionPicker.Body:
This helps give you more relevant guidance.
This information is only stored on your device and will never be shared with anyone else.
